Description: Pregnant with Vincent Ettrich's child, who is destined to restore order to the mercurial worlds of the living and dead, Isabelle Neukor is targeted by the agents of Chaos who would trap her in the land of the dead, where bizarre everyday occurrences are based on mortal nightmares. By the author of White Apples. Reprint. 20,000 first printing..
